componentAttributes.title: Become a Brightcove Insider and help shape the future of streaming video

componentAttributes.richTextValue:
Here at Brightcove, if we’re not pondering ways to move the streaming industry forward, then we’re thinking of our customers and what they need.


With this in mind we invite you to join the Brightcove Insider Program, an exclusive global network of Brightcove customers who are actively helping us develop our products. As a Brightcove Insider, you will make an impact on the future of video streaming as well as your own, because your input will allow us to create the products and features that you want.


As a Brightcove Insider, you will: 

  1. Get a preview of new Brightcove features before they’re generally available.
  2. Learn directly from our product team on new features and functions.
  3. Meet other Brightcove customers and early adopters to exchange ideas, tips, and best practices.
  4. Earn a Brightcove Insider badge and become an influencer in our user community.
  5. Receive a special surprise gift from us as a token of our gratitude for your contribution.


Sounds good? Become a Brightcove Insider now.


Join the Group


What happens next


Once you join the group, you’ll get a chance to meet and talk with like-minded professionals. You will learn about upcoming initiatives like our Early Adopter and Design Partner Programs, focus groups we’re planning, and lots more that you will be eligible to participate in (assuming you meet certain criteria, of course). You can apply to join whichever seems relevant to your role, your responsibilities, or how your organization uses streaming


Join the Group
